檡字的基本解释

檡
zhái
〔檡棘〕古书上说的一种树，木质细密坚韧，可做射箭的扳指，如“决用正，王棘若檡檡。”

檡
shì
黑枣。

檡
tú
〔於（

檡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhái］
［《廣韻》場伯切，入陌，澄。］
见“檡棘”。
[②]［tú］
［《集韻》同都切，平模，定。］
见“於檡”。

檡字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　檡； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页557第18
【唐韻】場伯切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】直格切，?音宅。【唐韻】檡棘善理堅韌者，可以爲射決。【周禮·夏官·繕人註】決用正，王棘若檡棘。　又【集韻】達各切，音鐸。又【五音集韻】夷益切，音奕。義?同。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?施隻切，音釋。義同。又梬棗也。　又【唐韻】【集韻】?同都切，音徒。楚人謂虎子爲於菟。【前漢·班固敘傳】作檡。

檡字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
檡字的起名意思

古书上说的一种树，木质细密坚韧，或指黑枣。

Mule
Basic explanation of words
Mule
zhái
[Mule thorn] A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books. The wood is dense and tough. It can be used as a finger for archery, such as "Use upright, the king thorn is like a mule."
Mule
shì
Black dates.
Mule
tú
〔in(
Mule
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhái］
["Guangyun" Chang Bo cuts, enters the street, and is clear. ]
See "Mule Spines".
[②]［tú］
["Ji Yun" are cut in the same way, flat mold, fixed. ]
See "Yu Yu".
Mule
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wooden Word Department] 　檡; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 557 18
[Tang Yun] Chang Boqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Zhigeqie,? Yinzhai. [Tang Yun] The mule is good at reason and tough, and can be used for shooting. 【Zhou Li·Xiaguan·Shangren's Note】Surely use upright, Wang Ji is like mule thorn.　[Jiyun] Da Geqie, Yin Duo. Also [Pentagram Rhyme] Yi Yi cuts, Yin Yi. Righteous? Same.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Shi Zhiqie, sound interpretation. The same meaning. It's also a jujube.　[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Same all cut, sound disciple. The people of Chu said that the tiger is Yu Tu. [Previous Han·Bangguxu Biography] As a mule.

Mule
Name meaning
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books, the wood is dense and tough, or refers to the black jujube.
